name: Cosmos omnibus
description:
Your crew left you. You are alone in the dark space surrounded by enemies, you should gather resources to be able to produce what you want and construct your station the way you want . 

note: The building/gathering side of the game was planned but will be a post jam thing. 

Controls: wasd and arrows to move your ship and left mouse to shoot enemies. Space bar to activate engine.

Each time you play a new map is generated.
